sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Remove default value of 'Actual Start Date' from project_key_milestone_baseline table</description> <name>Remove actual start date default value</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary'); gr.addEncodedQuery('name=project_key_milestone_baseline^element=work_start'); gr.query(); if (gr.next()) { gr.setValue('default_value', ''); gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-01-21 15:20:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6df86ed253f120103ad4ddeeff7b12f4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Remove actual start date default value</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="PPM Standard" source="com.snc.financial_planning_pmo">92ef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6df86ed253f120103ad4ddeeff7b12f4</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-01-21 15:20:18</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Remove actual start date default value
